LanguageData.SY_CA.TooltipGlobalSettings: Allows modifying all animals at once
LanguageData.SY_CA.TooltipFilter: Apply a filter to the list Use * to filter for modified entries
LanguageData.SY_CA.TooltipTrainabilityRoamingWarning: Trainability above 'None' without removing roaming (set to 0) is of no use, as animals which require a pen cannot leave it.
LanguageData.SY_CA.RoamMtbDays: Mean time before Roam in Days
LanguageData.SY_CA.TooltipRoamMtbDays: Mean time in days before an animal starts roaming. To disable roaming set it to 0. (Roamers require a pen which restricts their movement and makes trainability pointless.)
LanguageData.SY_CA.TooltipRoamMtbDaysChk: Make this animal a roamer and as such require a pen. Animals which require a pen won't leave it by themselves, thus making trainability pointless.
